markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Fulu of the Stoic Ox](/Equipment.aspx?ID=977)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Fulu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=378" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 159 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 25 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You attempt a Fortitude save against a [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46).

 
</row>

</column>

---

The ox on this fulu rests vigilantly on the point of the armor right over the bearer's heart, protecting the bearer against diseases and safeguarding their health. When you activate the fulu, you gain a +2 status bonus on the triggering Fortitude save and on all Fortitude saves against the same disease for the next minute.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Fulu of the Stoic Ox
